title: Future of Energy Special
itunes:title: Future of Energy Special
description:
The U.K. government is expected to unveil its energy security plan amid soaring prices and in the wake of Russia's invasion of Ukraine. Nick Wayth, CEO of Energy Institute says there is no quick fix to global prices but we need to get far more efficient with energy use. Stew Horne from Energy Saving Trust tells Bloomberg Westminster's Caroline Hepker and Yuan Potts the government should offer grants, low and no-cost finance and independent advice to retrofit homes. But the industry is at a critical point and fragile, according to Charles Wood at the trade body Energy UK.
